description: Try our easy to follow Mini Pappadums with Indian Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Pappadums with Indian Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chicken. Discard skin and bones. Shred meat (you will need about 3 cups). Combine aioli, curry paste and milk in a bowl. Add chicken and toss to combine.
Cook pappadums, in batches, in the microwave on HIGH (100%) for 30 seconds or until puffed and crisp.

Transfer to a platter and top each with 1tbs chicken mixture. Garnish with mango chutney and herbs. Serve. Save time: Prepare the chicken filling and pappadums in advance. Store each in airtight containers. Place chicken in the fridge and pappadums in the pantry. On the day, assemble from step 3.
